name.str_pl: sets of rudimentary occult research results

description: Jotted down thoughts about the hidden things of the world.  Nothing here is particularly profound, and you'll probably not need to consult this again.

name.str_pl: sets of apprentice occult research results

description: Musings and tangents mixed with a few real insights.  You know there's power to be grasped out there, if you can just find out how to do it.

name.str_pl: sets of old occult research notes

description: A set of your notes about the occult.  You've already gotten most of the value you can out of these, but you never know when it might be useful in the future.
A compilation of your elementary magical observations.  This would be extremely useful as a reference material.
